TitleEnglish: Macross 7: The Galaxy is Calling Me
SummaryEnglish: While investigating a sound anomaly across the galaxy, Basara crash-lands on a snowy planet and receives an unfriendly welcome from the local residents. On the planet, he befriends Pedro, a four-year-old boy who watches the Galaxy Network and idolizes Fire Bomber. Basara also discovers that the sound he's searching for is generated by Emilia, a lone Meltrandi struggling to make music of her own.
Aliases: Macross 7 Movie: Ginga ga Ore wo Yondeiru!
